2.4. Board Volume Calculations

  


Requirements

To calculate the board footage for a log, use the Doyle method:

  


![](data:image/png;base64,)

  


Development Specification

Expression: BoardFeet = (Diameter - 4) ^ 2 * Length / 16

MathJax: BoardFeet = \frac{(Diameter-4)^2*Length}{16}

Source: [https://timbeter.com/help/doyle-log-rule/](https://timbeter.com/help/doyle-log-rule/)

  


Bid: CalcBoardFeet(Diameter, Length) macro

  


Add unit tests. 

  


2 hours
